article.headline: Santa Clara 90, Houston Baptist 67
article.story: SANTA CLARA, Calif. -- Raymond Cowels III and Evan Roquemore scored 17 points apiece Friday night to pace Santa Clara to a 90-67 victory over Houston Baptist. The output by Cowels and Roquemore represented season highs for each, and Roquemore had a career-high seven assists. Marc Trasolini added 16 points and Kevin Foster had 12, all on 3-pointers, as the Broncos (6-5) turned a 43-35 halftime advantage into a one-sided game. Great West Conference scoring leader Andrew Gonzalez had 22 points to pace the Huskies (1-9), and Sammy Obetoh had a career-high 20 points and a game-high nine rebounds. Santa Clara drilled 10 of its 22 3-point attempts to 6 of 18 for Houston Baptist. The Broncos held a shooting advantage of 46.3 percent (31 of 67) to 38.1 percent (24 of 63) for Houston Baptist. They also outrebounded the Huskies 48-35.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
